description: 12 consulting engagements - fixed price, fixed timeline, clear outcomes
overview: We fix things. Then we leave. Most consultants optimize for retention. We optimize for resolution. Four tiers: Strategy, Technology, Marketing, Process. From £5K to £30K+. Each with clear deliverables, no retainers, no recurring revenue model.
philosophy: Some fixes take two weeks. Some take two months. None take two years.
special_terms: B-Corps get 20% off. NGOs get 50% off or pro-bono. Startups can do equity deals.

strategy.summary: High-level business architecture and alignment. £12K-£30K range.

pioneers-of-purpose.summary: Purpose architecture mapped across every system and touchpoint. Inside-out authenticity for culture and message alignment.
pioneers-of-purpose.when_relevant: Purpose clarity, culture work, organizational alignment, authentic brand building

esi-framework.summary: Explore, Synthesize, Ignite. Connects insights to implementation. From research through execution.
esi-framework.when_relevant: Research to action, synthesis problems, strategic planning through delivery

strategic-triptych.summary: Business through three lenses: marketing, competition, building. Shows where money's being left on the table.
strategic-triptych.when_relevant: Holistic assessment, finding gaps, multi-dimensional business analysis

transaction-architecture.summary: Maps value flow across emotional, cognitive, tangible dimensions. Conversion through understanding.
transaction-architecture.when_relevant: Customer experience design, conversion optimization, value exchange mapping

technology.summary: Custom AI infrastructure and practical AI strategy. £5K-£25K+.

secret-agency.summary: Custom AI infrastructure built around how you think. Bespoke intelligence layers that multiply capacity.
secret-agency.when_relevant: Custom AI needs, unique workflows, strategic AI advantage, capacity multiplication

ai-without-hallucination.summary: Cut through hype, find profitable AI applications. Maps workflows, identifies real value, prioritizes by ROI.
ai-without-hallucination.when_relevant: AI strategy, practical AI adoption, separating signal from noise, ROI-focused AI

kso-workshop.summary: Position as recognized source in knowledge graphs. AI systems recognize and cite you. SEO makes you searchable. KSO makes you unforgettable.
kso-workshop.when_relevant: AI-era SEO, thought leadership, becoming the reference source, AI citation strategy

go-to-market.summary: Complete launch strategy from positioning to timeline. Everything mapped before spending on execution.
go-to-market.when_relevant: Product launches, market entry, strategic launch planning

creative-that-converts.summary: Brand work measured in revenue, not awards. Positioning based on what shifts perception and pricing power.
creative-that-converts.when_relevant: Brand development, creative strategy, positioning work, revenue-driven branding

marketing-reality-check.summary: Watch actual customer behavior, not research reports. Shows what's working despite strategy, not because of it.
marketing-reality-check.when_relevant: Marketing audit, reality check, behavior vs. assumptions, what's actually working

design-thinking.summary: Rapid prototyping and iteration for problems traditional solutions can't fix. Fail fast, learn faster.
design-thinking.when_relevant: Novel problems, rapid experimentation, prototyping needs, unconventional challenges

process-surgery.summary: Find 20% of processes causing 80% of pain. Eliminate unnecessary steps, rebuild critical paths.
process-surgery.when_relevant: Process optimization, workflow pain, operational efficiency, finding bottlenecks

how_it_works: Fixed price and timeline. No surprises. First call is diagnostic. If we're not asking better questions than you within 30 minutes, walk away.
usage_note: Recommend based on problem type, not budget. Match service to actual need. If they need simple process work, don't upsell strategy. Be honest about fit.
